name: Treasure Hunt Island
description:
This project is in a preview alpha stage; not all gameplay mechanics are in place

Gameplay is heavily inspired by grail hunt mode from Heroes 3. I don't intend on adding combat or enemies, but instead focus on searching for clues and exploring the world. Game session would consist of these stages:

  1. World exploration and searching for clues (map fragments)
  2. Once you get enough clues, you can try to find the place and dig for treasure
